original: @284b # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @284b # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya t'a r'ashta bha ya tra n'a ma s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya t'a r'ashta bha ya tra n'a ma s'a dha nam /
translated: Aryatārāṣṭabhayarakṣaṇanāma-sādhana

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: Ārya-tārāṣṭabhayarakṣaṇanāma-sādhana

original: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Tārā.

original: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bdag po lhan cig skyes pa'i chos sku de bzhin du //
analyzed: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bdag po lhan cig skyes pa'i chos sku de bzhin du //
translated: The innate dharmakāya of the omniscient lord of victors,

original: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku ste padma'i 'dab ma bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku ste padma'i 'dab ma bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan //
translated: The saṃbhogakāya and nirmāṇakāya, with eyes as vast as lotus petals,

original: rnal 'byor dag par rnam par thar gyur srid dang srid las bral ba'i sku gsung thugs chags pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dag par rnam par thar gyur srid dang srid las bral ba'i sku gsung thugs chags pa //
translated: Liberated in pure yoga, the body, speech, and mind free from existence and nonexistence,

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med lha min mis mchod de la phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med lha min mis mchod de la phyag 'tshal te //
translated: I pay homage to the deity of nondual method and wisdom, worshipped by demigods and humans.

original: skye 'jig rnam par spangs phyir chos nyid mi 'gyur yang dag nyid du dbyer med kyang //
analyzed: skye 'jig rnam par spangs phyir chos nyid mi 'gyur yang dag nyid du dbyer med kyang //
translated: Because of being free from birth and destruction, dharmatā is unchanging, truly inseparable,

original: 'khrul bcas 'gro ba'i don phyir sku gsungs thugs kyi phrin las khyad par gsang sngags lam //
analyzed: 'khrul bcas 'gro ba'i don phyir sku gsungs thugs kyi phrin las khyad par gsang sngags lam //
translated: For the sake of deluded beings, the enlightened activity of body, speech, and mind is especially secret mantra.

original: sgrib pa myur 'joms sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gzugs 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum //
analyzed: sgrib pa myur 'joms sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gzugs 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum //
translated: The mother who gives rise to all buddhas, the form of various mudras that quickly conquers obscurations,

original: @285a * // 'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol ba 'di deng sgrub la dga' phyir dad pas brtsam par bya //
analyzed: @285a * // 'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol ba 'di deng sgrub la dga' phyir dad pas brtsam par bya //
translated: is liberated from the eight fears. Today, for the sake of accomplishing this, I will begin with faith and joy.

original: dad ldan rab brtson dam tshig ldan //
analyzed: dad ldan rab brtson dam tshig ldan //
translated: Faithful, diligent, and committed,

original: rje btsun sgrub la dga' ba yis //
analyzed: rje btsun sgrub la dga' ba yis //
translated: with joy in accomplishing the venerable one,

original: rnam par 'tshe med dben ba'i gnas //
analyzed: rnam par 'tshe med dben ba'i gnas //
translated: in a place free from harm and distraction,

original: nyams dga' dngos grub 'byung gnas su //
analyzed: nyams dga' dngos grub 'byung gnas su //
translated: a delightful place where siddhis arise,

original: rten dang mchod rdzas sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: rten dang mchod rdzas sna tshogs pa //
translated: having arranged various supports and offering substances,

original: bshams nas bde ba'i stan nyid la //
analyzed: bshams nas bde ba'i stan nyid la //
translated: on a comfortable seat,

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul gyis //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul gyis //
translated: in the posture of the perfect Buddha,

original: phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te //
analyzed: phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te //
translated: having purified with inner and outer ablutions,

original: de nas rang gi snying ga ru //
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga ru //
translated: then in one's heart center,

original: nga ro dang po las byung ba'i //
analyzed: nga ro dang po las byung ba'i //
translated: from the first sound,

original: chu shel dbus su yi ge ni //
analyzed: chu shel dbus su yi ge ni //
translated: in the center of a water crystal, the syllable

original: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la //
analyzed: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la //
translated: of the first of the fourth class,

original: lnga pa'i tha ma'i thig les brgyan //
analyzed: lnga pa'i tha ma'i thig les brgyan //
translated: And is adorned with the final drop of the fifth.🔽Its light invites the Venerable One

original: de yi 'od kyis rje btsun dang // 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams spyan drangs te //
analyzed: de yi 'od kyis rje btsun dang // 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams spyan drangs te //
translated: And the host of the Noble Ones.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //🔽gti mug ldongs pa'i sems can gyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku // gti mug ldongs pa'i sems can gyi //
translated: The wisdom body of all the Buddhas,🔽The dispeller of the darkness of ignorance

original: ma rig mun pa sel mdzad ma //
analyzed: ma rig mun pa sel mdzad ma //
translated: Of beings blinded by delusion,

original: bde gshegs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bde gshegs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Sugata Tārā.🔽All fragrant flowers,🔽Aguru and other incense,🔽The lamp that dispels darkness,🔽The supreme scent of camphor and so forth,

original: dri zhim me tog thams cad dang // aa ga ru sogs bdug spos dang // rab tu mun sel sgron me dang // ga pur la sogs dri yi mchog / gtsang spyar bshos dang gzhan yang ni //
analyzed: dri zhim me tog thams cad dang // aa ga ru sogs bdug spos dang // rab tu mun sel sgron me dang // ga pur la sogs dri yi mchog / gtsang spyar bshos dang gzhan yang ni //
translated: Purely prepared food and other offerings,

original: sgra snyan la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs //🔽thams cad dbul te sngags dang ni //
analyzed: sgra snyan la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs // thams cad dbul te sngags dang ni //
translated: The assembly of offerings such as pleasant sounds,🔽All of these I offer with mantras

original: phyag rgya'i rgyas kyang gdab par bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rgyas kyang gdab par bya //
translated: And also with mudras.

original: 'khor ba thog ma med par du //
analyzed: 'khor ba thog ma med par du //
translated: From beginningless cyclic existence

original: sdig bgyis gang lags ma lus pa //
analyzed: sdig bgyis gang lags ma lus pa //
translated: Whatever negative actions I have done,

original: da lta nyid du bshags bgyis nas //
analyzed: da lta nyid du bshags bgyis nas //
translated: Having confessed them all right now,

original: slan chad nam yang mi bgyid do //
analyzed: slan chad nam yang mi bgyid do //
translated: I will never do them again.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs 'phags rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi dge ba ni //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs 'phags rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi dge ba ni //
translated: And of all beings,

original: zag med zag dang bcas pa la //
analyzed: zag med zag dang bcas pa la //
translated: Whether uncontaminated or contaminated,

original: bsam pas rje'i su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: bsam pas rje'i su yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in them all with a pure intention.

original: 'gro mgon sprin bral nyi ma yi//
analyzed: 'gro mgon sprin bral nyi ma yi//
translated: To the sun-like protectors of beings,

original: dkyil 'khor rgyas par gyur rnams la //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyas par gyur rnams la //
translated: Whose maṇḍalas are vast and cloudless,

original: 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to benefit all beings,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //🔽rgyal ba zag med dbyings nyid du //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul // rgyal ba zag med dbyings nyid du //
translated: I request you to turn the wheel of Dharma.🔽To the victors who wish to see

original: mya ngan 'das gzigs bzhed rnams la //🔽ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi bar //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das gzigs bzhed rnams la // ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi bar //
translated: The realm of nirvāṇa, free from contamination,🔽I request you to remain

original: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
analyzed: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
translated: For as long as saṃsāra endures.

original: don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med //
analyzed: don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med //
translated: The ultimate nature is free from characteristics,

original: rnam par mi rtog chos sku las //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog chos sku las //
translated: And the dharmakāya is nonconceptual.🔽Yet you, protectors of beings,

original: gzugs sku lta bu'i tshul 'chang ba'i //
analyzed: gzugs sku lta bu'i tshul 'chang ba'i //
translated: Take on forms that appear in the world.

original: 'gro mgon khyed la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: 'gro mgon khyed la skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to you.

original: ji ltar dus gsum mgon pa rnams //
analyzed: ji ltar dus gsum mgon pa rnams //
translated: Just as the lords of the three times

original: byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed ltar //
analyzed: byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed ltar //
translated: Aroused the mind of supreme awakening,

original: bdag kyang 'gro rnams bsgom pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag kyang 'gro rnams bsgom pa'i phyir //
translated: So I too, for the sake of all beings,🔽Arouse the mind of supreme awakening.

original: byang chub @285b mchog tu sems bskyed do //🔽phyag 'tshal la sogs bgyis pa las //
analyzed: byang chub @285b mchog tu sems bskyed do // phyag 'tshal la sogs bgyis pa las //
translated: I generate the supreme mind of awakening.

original: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
analyzed: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
translated: Through the merit I have gained from prostrations and so forth,🔽May sentient beings quickly attain

original: sems can lus sangs rgyas kyi //🔽sa ni myar du thob par shog /'gro ba bde dang phrad la sogs //
analyzed: sems can lus sangs rgyas kyi // sa ni myar du thob par shog /'gro ba bde dang phrad la sogs //
translated: The buddha’s stage of body.

original: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
translated: I will meditate on the four immeasurables,🔽such as sentient beings meeting with happiness.

original: de nas 'phags rnams gshegs byas la //
analyzed: de nas 'phags rnams gshegs byas la //
translated: Then, after the noble ones have been invited,

original: brtan g-yo'i chos kun stong bar bsgom //
analyzed: brtan g-yo'i chos kun stong bar bsgom //
translated: I meditate on all phenomena, stable and moving, as empty.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /🔽de nas chu skyes steng du ni //
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham / de nas chu skyes steng du ni //
translated: oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ🔽Then, upon a lotus,

original: chu shel de steng sa bon no //
analyzed: chu shel de steng sa bon no //
translated: is a water crystal, and upon that, a seed syllable.

original: de yongs gyur las autpa la //
analyzed: de yongs gyur las autpa la //
translated: That completely transforms into a lotus

original: sa bon nyid kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon nyid kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: marked with the seed syllable.

original: de yi 'od kyis skye dgu rnams //
analyzed: de yi 'od kyis skye dgu rnams //
translated: Its light purifies living beings

original: sbyangs nas yongs gyur bcom ldan ma //
analyzed: sbyangs nas yongs gyur bcom ldan ma //
translated: and completely transforms them into the Bhagavatī.🔽She has one face, two arms, and the complexion of a jasmine flower,

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis d'ur ba'i mdog / bcu drug na tshod rgyan rnams rdzogs //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis d'ur ba'i mdog / bcu drug na tshod rgyan rnams rdzogs //
translated: is sixteen years old, and is fully adorned.

original: mchog sbyin pa dang autpa la //
analyzed: mchog sbyin pa dang autpa la //
translated: She makes the boon-granting gesture and holds an utpala flower.

original: g-yas dang g-yon du shes bya ste //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon du shes bya ste //
translated: One should know them to be on the right and left.

original: phyed krung gis bzhugs 'dzum pa'i bzhin //
analyzed: phyed krung gis bzhugs 'dzum pa'i bzhin //
translated: Seated in the half-lotus posture, with a smiling face,

original: mtsho steng rin chen brag phrug nang //
analyzed: mtsho steng rin chen brag phrug nang //
translated: on a lake, in a jeweled grotto,

original: ltos 'gros zhabs brten bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ltos 'gros zhabs brten bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the one who supports the feet of the one who moves by looking.

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi dang po ni //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi dang po ni //
translated: The first on the right and left

original: mam dang pram las lha mo ni //🔽'od zer can dang so so 'brang //
analyzed: mam dang pram las lha mo ni // 'od zer can dang so so 'brang //
translated: are the goddesses Māmakī and Gauri,🔽born from mam and pram,

original: gser mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //🔽rgyan mdzes g-yon na shing lo ni //
analyzed: gser mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma // rgyan mdzes g-yon na shing lo ni //
translated: golden-colored, with one face and two arms,

original: mya ngan med dang rdo rje bsnams //
analyzed: mya ngan med dang rdo rje bsnams //
translated: beautiful ornaments, holding in the left a branch of an aśoka tree and a vajra,

original: g-yas ba 'dud pa'i tshul du'o //
analyzed: g-yas ba 'dud pa'i tshul du'o //
translated: and in the right hand in the manner of bestowing gifts.

original: g-yas kyi 'og mar phag gdong ma ;
analyzed: g-yas kyi 'og mar phag gdong ma ;
translated: The lower right is Varahi,

original: / p'a la sha mdog rgyan gyis mdzes //
analyzed: / p'a la sha mdog rgyan gyis mdzes //
translated: the color of a palasha flower, beautiful with ornaments,

original: chos 'chad pa yi phyag rgya can //
analyzed: chos 'chad pa yi phyag rgya can //
translated: with the mudra of teaching the Dharma.

original: g-yon gyi 'og mar khro gnyer ma //
analyzed: g-yon gyi 'og mar khro gnyer ma //
translated: The lower left is Bhṛkuṭī,

original: mig sman mdog can khro mo'i tshul //
analyzed: mig sman mdog can khro mo'i tshul //
translated: the color of collyrium, with an angry expression,

original: gri gug thod khrag bsnams pa'o //🔽de dag rnams kyi phyogs mtshams ni //
analyzed: gri gug thod khrag bsnams pa'o // de dag rnams kyi phyogs mtshams ni //
translated: holding a flaying knife and blood-filled skull cup.🔽In the eight directions around them

original: brgyad na 'jigs pa rnam pa brgyad //
analyzed: brgyad na 'jigs pa rnam pa brgyad //
translated: are the eight fears.

original: bgegs dang dgra dang glang chen dang // me dang sbrul dang mi rgod dang // lcags sgrog gis bcings chu rnams las //
analyzed: bgegs dang dgra dang glang chen dang // me dang sbrul dang mi rgod dang // lcags sgrog gis bcings chu rnams las //
translated: fire, snakes, wild men, and being bound by iron chains,🔽from all of these

original: skyob byed sgrol ma brgyad 'phro ba //
analyzed: skyob byed sgrol ma brgyad 'phro ba //
translated: the eight emanations of Tārā protect.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
translated: The yogin should meditate on them.

original: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las //
analyzed: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las //
translated: Then from the seed syllable in the heart

original: 'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: 'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' ni //
translated: light radiates and invites the gnosis beings

original: snga ma'i tshul can spyan / drangs la //
analyzed: snga ma'i tshul can spyan / drangs la //
translated: in the manner of before.

original: mchod nas yi ge bzhi po yis //
analyzed: mchod nas yi ge bzhi po yis //
translated: Having made offerings, with the four syllables

original: gnyis su med par bstim par bya //
analyzed: gnyis su med par bstim par bya //
translated: they are dissolved into the commitment beings.

original: yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du //
translated: With the three syllables, the three places

original: byin gyis brlab bya de yi rjes //🔽dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab bya de yi rjes // dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni //
translated: are consecrated, and after that🔽the empowerment is conferred.🔽The lord of the family adorns the crown

original: don yod grub pas spyi gtsug brgyan //
analyzed: don yod grub pas spyi gtsug brgyan //
translated: of Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nas sa bon las byung ba'i //
analyzed: de nas sa bon las byung ba'i //
translated: Then from the seed syllable

original: 'od kyi spro bsdu cung zad bya //
analyzed: 'od kyi spro bsdu cung zad bya //
translated: a little light emanates and returns.

original: skyon gsang @286a * //
analyzed: skyon gsang @286a * //
translated: The faults are purified

original: sngags bzlas pa ni //
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa ni //
translated: and the mantra recitation

original: yi ge bcu pa bgrang bar bya //
analyzed: yi ge bcu pa bgrang bar bya //
translated: is the recitation of the ten syllables.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā.

original: 'bum phrag gsum mam yang na drug /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub //
analyzed: 'bum phrag gsum mam yang na drug /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub //
translated: One will accomplish the rites with three, six, or ten hundred thousand.

original: gal te 'byung po rnams la ni //🔽gtor ma sbyin na snod gtsang du //
analyzed: gal te 'byung po rnams la ni // gtor ma sbyin na snod gtsang du //
translated: If one is to give a bali to the bhūtas,🔽one should place rice in a clean vessel,

original: zan blugs cho gas byin brlabs te //🔽lag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las //🔽mdzub gnyis gung mo gnyis po la //
analyzed: zan blugs cho gas byin brlabs te // lag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las // mdzub gnyis gung mo gnyis po la //
translated: consecrate it with the ritual,🔽and with the two hands in añjali🔽form the uḍupīḍa with the two index fingers

original: legs bcang ba ni autpa la //
analyzed: legs bcang ba ni autpa la //
translated: and the two middle fingers.

original: kha 'byed pa'i ni phyag rgya ste //
analyzed: kha 'byed pa'i ni phyag rgya ste //
translated: The mudra of opening the mouth

original: gnas gsum dag tu gtugs byas nas //
analyzed: gnas gsum dag tu gtugs byas nas //
translated: is applied to the three places

original: 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin //
translated: and the bali is given to the bhūtas.

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ akaro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām advaidhānupalabdhitaḥ oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: las kyi yan lag thams cad ni //
analyzed: las kyi yan lag thams cad ni //
translated: Since all the limbs of the rite

original: rgyas par rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyas par rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir //
translated: are taught extensively in the tantra,

original: 'di ru ma bkod de ru blta //
analyzed: 'di ru ma bkod de ru blta //
translated: they are not set forth here.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis //
translated: Whoever of the yogis

original: 'di don nyams su len byed na //
analyzed: 'di don nyams su len byed na //
translated: practices this meaning

original: dngos dang dngos med zad gtso bo //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med zad gtso bo //
translated: should be the foremost in exhausting existence and nonexistence,

original: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
translated: peaceful, without beginning or end,🔽and free from the signs of faults.

original: skye dang zag pa rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: skye dang zag pa rnam spangs pa //
translated: And the abandonment of birth and defilement,

original: dpal ldan yum nyid thob 'gyur te //
analyzed: dpal ldan yum nyid thob 'gyur te //
translated: One attains the glorious state of the Mother,🔽And also the accomplishments such as the excellent vase,

original: bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub dang // gzhan yang gsad dang bskrad dang dbye //
analyzed: bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub dang // gzhan yang gsad dang bskrad dang dbye //
translated: And the other activities of killing, expelling, and separating,

original: dgug dang zhi dang rgyas pa yi //
analyzed: dgug dang zhi dang rgyas pa yi //
translated: And the activities of summoning, pacifying, and enriching,

original: las 'grub 'gyur ba smos ci dgos //
analyzed: las 'grub 'gyur ba smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention their accomplishment?

original: de ltar stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid srid pa gsum skyes zad dngos shes dang ni //
analyzed: de ltar stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid srid pa gsum skyes zad dngos shes dang ni //
translated: Thus, the one who is the embodiment of emptiness and compassion, who knows the exhaustion of birth and existence in the three realms,

original: shes bya gnyis su med sku kun du bzang po spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum //
analyzed: shes bya gnyis su med sku kun du bzang po spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum //
translated: And the non-dual wisdom body of the cognized, the embodiment of the various activities of Samantabhadra, is the Mother.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud bzhin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud bzhin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med //
translated: Through the merit of composing this sadhana of the Blessed Lady, in accordance with the tantras,🔽May all beings attain constant bliss and nirvana.

original: bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob shog /'phags pa 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob shog /'phags pa 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The sadhana of Tara called Protector from the Eight Fears composed by the great master Candragomin is complete.

original: // / rgya gar byi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las //
analyzed: // / rgya gar byi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las //
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot Dipamkarasrtjftana and the Tibetan translator Lotsawa Tsultrim Gyalwa.

original: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' d'a na sh'i la dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba lal gyo blo gros grags pas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' d'a na sh'i la dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba lal gyo blo gros grags pas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: Later, the Indian abbot Bodhisattva Dftana§rf and the Tibetan translator Lotsawa Lhalung Pelgyi Dorje revised and finalized it.
